text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Kalabhairavar puja, Railway Colony, 5 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Kazhagam: Discourse by Suba Saiganesan, R. Chandrasekaran and M. Vijayaraman on ‘Vallalar Koorum Mupperum Nerikal,” North Adi Street, 7 p.m.

Ramakrishna Math: Vivekananda jayanthi celebrations, 5 a.m. onwards, Discourse by SP. Ramachandran on ‘Viveka Chintamani’ 5.45 p.m., Aarathi, Reserve Line, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Paneeru Thirumurai Mandram: Pannisai by S.S. Mohanram, Adi Street, 7 a.m., Discourse on ‘Periapuranam’ by N.S. Sundararaman, No. 26 Pandian Street, Sundar Nagar, Tirunagar, 5 p.m.

Rajarajeswari Aanmeega Illakiya Mandram: 109{+t}{+h}discourse by M. Srinivasan on ‘Sanga Tamizhmalai’ Manicka Mandapam, No. 116 South Avani Moola Street, 6.35 p.m.

Universal Peace Sanchiary: Free meditation class by Sathguru Sundaramoorthi Sachidananda, No. 138 Kamarajar Road, Mariamman Teppakulam, 7 p.m.

Sri Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Upanishad class by Swami Samanandar, P and T Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

St. Lourdes Shrine: 96{+t}{+h}anniversary celebrations, special prayers and songs, K.Pudur, 5.30 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service and special Bible study, Devamanickam and M.S. Raja address, Viswasapuri, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

The American College: Sunday Vespers Service, Dr. S. Wellington and Dr. J. Jebaraj address, Jubilee chapel, 6 p.m.

St. Joseph’s Church: Madurai Pallium celebration, Rev. Antony Pappusamy Archbishop of Madurai receives Pallium blessed by Pope Francis, St. Peter’s Basilica Rome, Gnanaolivupuram church, 5.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Arulgnana Sabai: 191{+s}{+t}meeting, Nanchil Sampath speaks on “Villum Sollum,” Thiagarajar College of Engineering campus, 6.30 p.m.

The Divine Life Society: Satsang bhajans, Swami Sivananda Sundarananda presides, Pulavar Kishore speaks on ‘Thirukural,’ Meenakshi Temple, South Adi Street, 7 p.m.

Yadava Cultural Association: Monthly meeting, V. Veeranan president presides, M. Karuppanalagu secretary address, Min Nagar, K. Pudur, 6 p.m.

Arsha Parampara: Mundakopanishad 7 a.m. and Bhaja Govindam, Yagasalai Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m., Lalitha Sahasranamam and spiritual heritage classes by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Temple, 10 a.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Sath sang on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life divine’ by Prof. Subramony, Nithyatha, Aurolab, Veerapanchan, 10 a.m.

Gandhi Memorial Museum: K.P. Gangadharan, yoga coordinator, conducts, yoga classes, 6 a.m., 10.30 a.m. and 5 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre: Yoga training by S. Yoganand, Department of Philosophy, Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

GENERAL

P.K.N. Matriculation Higher Secondary School: 35{+t}{+h}sports day and annual day celebrations, S. Annaraj, Inspector of Police, Tirumangalam, town chief guest, 7.45 a.m., R. Anbukkarasi, Principal, Tamil Nadu Polytechnic College, Madurai, chief guest, school president P. Senthilrajan Nadar presides, school campus, 5.30 p.m.

Virudhunagar T.S.M. Manicka Nadar-Janaki Ammal HSS: 40{+t}{+h}Ruby annual day, Dr. K. Sarukesi, Dean, Kamaraj College of Engineering and Technology, Virudhunagar, chief guest, L.A.M.K. auditorium, New Ramnad Road, 4.15 p.m.

Pandugudi Sri Lakshmi Narayana Vidyalaya: ‘Kalpavirukshaha’ – fifth annual day, S. Narayanan, chairman, presides, S. Kalyanaraman, principal, Kendriya Vidyalaya, Karaikudi, chief guest, A. Valayapatti, Alagarkoil, 3 p.m.

Sakthi Vidiyal: 22{+n}{+d}anniversary celebrations, S. Dhanasekara Pandian, Deputy Director (Social Defence Department) & District Child Protection Officer, chief guest, Devaneyan, Director, Thozhamai, Chennai, felicitates, IMA Hall, Panagal Road, 3 p.m.

Sumathi Hospital: Dr. S. Manorama first year memorial multi-speciality mega camp, Anna Nagar, 10 a.m.

Sruthi Physiotherapy Clinic: Free bone mineral density camp in association with S.P. Ortho Centre, opp. SVN College, Nagamalai Pudukottai, 10 a.m.

Puratchi Kavingnar Mandram: Condolence meeting for Tamizhannal, Mandram president P. Varadarajan presides, R. Illankumaran addresses, Maniammai Primary School, No. 75 North Masi Street, 5 p.m.

Sivananda Tapovanam: 500{+t}{+h}Sivananda free general medical camp, R. Muthiah, DGM, Indian Bank, presides, Dr. S. Vadivelmurugan, inaugurates, Thoppur, 8 a.m.

Ramya Neuro Hospital: Neuro medical exhibition, IMA Hall, Medical College campus, Panagal Road, 9 a.m. to 1 p.m.

SBOA Matric Higher Secondary School: Seven-day NSS camp, temple campus cleaning, 8 a.m., talk on general medicine by Dr. K. Murugesh Kumar, Melakuyilkudi community centre, 2 p.m.

Vivekananda College: Uzhavara pani by students at one-day camp in Vadipatti Pon Perumal Temple, 8 a.m.

SPJ Matriculation HSS: 10{+t}{+h}annual day celebrations, second day event, V.V. Rajan Chellappa Mayor of Madurai chief guest, school premises, Avaniapuram, 5 p.m.

Lions Club of Madurai Pandyan: Executive committee meeting and general body meeting, Hotel Rajadhane, KK Nagar, 6.35 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Justice V.R.Krishna Iyer Hall, KK Nagar, 7 p.m., Alfred Noble Mat. HSS, Tirunagar, 8{+t}{+h}bus stop, 11 a.m.

MELUR

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, R.C. School, Sivaganga Road, 6.30 p.m.
title: madurai today
